Felipe Gutierrez Barragan

Dept. of Computer Sciences. University of Wisconsin-Madison.

4140a WID

330 North Orchard St.

Madison, WI 53715

I am a first year graduate student in the Computer Vision Group at UW-Madison advised by Mohit Gupta. My research interests are in computational imaging, optimization, machine learning and physics-based models.

I did my undergraduate studies at UW-Madison where I graduated from the AMEP and Computer Sciences programs. During my undergraduate I worked with Vikas Singh on the statistical analysis of brain images, and with Dan Negrut on high performance computing applied to fluid simulations.

For an overview of my professional and academic experiences please refer to my CV
